MSSQL_DRIVER.description: Environment variable that specifies the driver to connect to the MSSQL database.
MSSQL_DRIVER.title: MSSQL_DRIVER

MSSQL_HOST.description: Environment variable that specifies the hostname or IP address of the MSSQL server.
MSSQL_HOST.title: MSSQL_HOST

MSSQL_USER.description: Environment variable that defines the username for connecting to the MSSQL database.
MSSQL_USER.title: MSSQL_USER

MSSQL_PASSWORD.description: Environment variable that stores the password for the MSSQL user.
MSSQL_PASSWORD.title: MSSQL_PASSWORD

MSSQL_DATABASE.description: Environment variable that specifies the name of the MSSQL database to connect to.
MSSQL_DATABASE.title: MSSQL_DATABASE
